item.title: Godzilla’s Bringing His Brand of Radioactive Chaos to Marvel Comics
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: After nearly 50 years, the King of the Monsters is making his way back to Marvel for a six-issue crossover event.
item.content:encoded: After nearly 50 years, the King of the Monsters is making his way back to Marvel for a six-issue crossover event.

item.title: Leigh Whannell Unpacks Wolf Man’s Horrific Influences
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Whannell's not just rebooting the old Wolf Man movie, he's also fusing present day anxieties with the spirit of old body horror flicks.
item.content:encoded: Whannell's not just rebooting the old Wolf Man movie, he's also fusing present day anxieties with the spirit of old body horror flicks.

item.title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners Gets a Blu-Ray and Manga Prequel
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: It may not get a sequel, but at least you'll be able to watch Cyberpunk: Edgerunners without worrying it'll get pulled from Netflix one day.
item.content:encoded: It may not get a sequel, but at least you'll be able to watch Cyberpunk: Edgerunners without worrying it'll get pulled from Netflix one day.

item.title: 1 in 6 Congresswomen Targeted by AI-Generated Sexually Explicit Deepfakes
item.dc:creator: Barbara Rodriguez and Jasmine Mithani for The 19th
item.description: A first-of-its-kind study highlights the stark gender disparity in AI-generated nonconsensual intimate images — and puts into focus the evolving risks for women in politics and public life.
item.content:encoded: A first-of-its-kind study highlights the stark gender disparity in AI-generated nonconsensual intimate images — and puts into focus the evolving risks for women in politics and public life.

item.title: Apple’s AI Disastrously Rewrote a BBC Headline to Say Luigi Mangione Shot Himself
item.dc:creator: Thomas Maxwell
item.description: Luigi Mangione did not shoot himself, but a BBC headline rewritten by Apple iOS would make you believe so.
item.content:encoded: Luigi Mangione did not shoot himself, but a BBC headline rewritten by Apple iOS would make you believe so.

item.title: A New Captain America Promo Puts the Weight of the World on Sam’s Wings
item.dc:creator: Justin Carter
item.description: Sam Wilson will prove his mettle and save the world when Captain America: Brave New World releases on Valentine's Day 2025.
item.content:encoded: Sam Wilson will prove his mettle and save the world when Captain America: Brave New World releases on Valentine's Day 2025.

item.title: Severe Pollution Is Slowing Down Warming in Major Cities
item.dc:creator: Lylla Younes, Grist
item.description: But this surprising effect of pollution should hardly be taken as a good sign.
item.content:encoded: But this surprising effect of pollution should hardly be taken as a good sign.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Plus Review: So Light, So Expensive
item.dc:creator: Kyle Barr
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Plus is light as a frisbee with all the trimmings you could want, but it makes too many compromises for its $700 price.
item.content:encoded: The Samsung Galaxy Chromebook Plus is light as a frisbee with all the trimmings you could want, but it makes too many compromises for its $700 price.

item.content:encoded: OpenAI, Meta, Google and Anthropic all in one place!

item.title: The High-Quality 65″ Samsung QLED 4K TV Is at Its Holiday All-Time Low, Grab Yours Before It’s Gone!
item.dc:creator: Joe Tilleli

item.content:encoded: Save a few hundred dollars on a 4K TV, bundle it with a Q-Series soundbar, and get $50 off your order.

item.title: Major Shift in Cervical Cancer Screening: What the Proposed Guidelines Mean for Women
item.dc:creator: Ed Cara
item.description: A new proposal recommends replacing routine pap smears with HPV testing every five years for women over 30, signaling a serious shift in cervical cancer screening guidelines.
item.content:encoded: A new proposal recommends replacing routine pap smears with HPV testing every five years for women over 30, signaling a serious shift in cervical cancer screening guidelines.

item.title: The Biggest Medical Breakthroughs of 2024
item.dc:creator: Ed Cara
item.description: A groundbreaking antipsychotic, a powerful new antibiotic, and a vaccine-like prophylactic for HIV are some of the most important drugs to have arrived this year.
item.content:encoded: A groundbreaking antipsychotic, a powerful new antibiotic, and a vaccine-like prophylactic for HIV are some of the most important drugs to have arrived this year.

item.title: ‘People Are Terrible at This’: Why We Suck at Judging the Strength of Knots
item.dc:creator: Margherita Bassi
item.description: A study asked participants to identify the stronger of two knots by sight alone. They failed spectacularly.
item.content:encoded: A study asked participants to identify the stronger of two knots by sight alone. They failed spectacularly.

item.title: We’re Costco Guys, Of Course We Got the $45 Gift Card With Our 1-Year Gold Star Membership

item.content:encoded: A Costco 1-year Gold Star membership now comes with a $45 digital Costco shop card.

item.title: The Comic Book History Behind Kraven‘s Wildest Spider-Man Connection
item.dc:creator: James Whitbrook
item.description: We may never know where Sony could've gone in still trying to make its Spidey-less Spider-Man spinoff universe happen, but Kraven still gave us one potentially wild path forward.
item.content:encoded: We may never know where Sony could've gone in still trying to make its Spidey-less Spider-Man spinoff universe happen, but Kraven still gave us one potentially wild path forward.
